Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 116th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1979...
Injured on 9/3/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Released by Chicago (N) on 6/2/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/21/1986 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/13/1990 with a Strained Calf Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Cleveland to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1994 (Going to CHC: C J. Mizerock. Going to CLE: 1B S. Mack, RF O. McDowell, P T. Burke)...
Had first career hit on 7/31/1994, off Kevin Appier (HOU)...
